V1C0L6: Ou pou bizin enn zwe kart par lekip (5 a 7 dimounn), enn roulo papie oubien enn papie 1x2m, kreyon, gom, penntel ek enn roulo latres kolant.
V1C0L7: Lobzektif zwe-la se ki, an-ekip, met bann kart dan lord bann koz ek bann lefe ek apre fer bann lien ant bann kart avek bann fles pou montre bann linpak sanzman klimatik.
V1C0L8: Servi bann kart par group ek atann ki tou kart enn group finn servi avan servi enn lot.
V1C0L9: Letan: 1er30 pou plas tou bann kart, 30 minit pou fer bann fles ek dekor fresk-la ek prezant bann rezilta. 1er-d'tan pou asiz ansam ek diskit bann solision.
V1C0L10: Pou enn version sinplifie, tir kart #10, #14, #15 ek/ou #41, #42.
V1C2L2: Lindistri servi bann lenerzi fosil ek elektrisite. Li reprezant 40% emision greenhouse gas. (GHG)
V1C3L2: Itilizasion batiman (lakaz ek komers) servi lenerzi fosil ek elektrisite. Li reprezant 15% emision greenhouse gas.
V1C4L2: Sekter transpor depann boukou lor petrol. Li reprezant 15% emision greenhouse gas.
V1C5L2: Lenerzi fosil se sarbon, petrol ek gaz. Servi zot prinsipalman dan konstriksion batiman, transpor ek dan lindistri. Zot larg CO2 kan bril zot.
V1C6L2: Deforestasion se kan koup ek bril bann pie ek depas kapasite lafore-la pou ki li rezenere. 80% deforestasion se akoz lagrikiltir.
V1C7L2: CO2, ou carbon dioxide, se premie greenhouse gas ki antropik (vinn depi bann aktivite imin). Bann emision CO2 vinn depi lenerzi fosil ek deforestasion.
V1C7L5: Emision CO2 par lane ki antropozenik (GtC/lane)
V1C8L2: Lagrikiltir responsab enn tigit emision CO2, me selman li responsab boukou emision methane (depi betay ek plantasion diri), ek ousi protoxyde azote (fertilizan). Antou se 25% greenhouse gas (GHG) si azout deforestasion pou lagrikiltir.
V1C9L2: CO2 se pa sel GHG. Ena ousi methane (CH4) ek protoxyde azote (N20) (ki vinn an gran parti depi lagrikiltir), ek lezot ousi.
V1C10L2: Pa mem zafer ki bann spray. Bann aerozol se enn polision lokal ki vinn depi  lenerzi fosil ki pa finn brile net. Zot move pou lasante e zot kontribie negativman a forcing radiatif (zot refrwadi klima).
V1C11L2: Enn fwa ki lamwatie nou bann emision CO2 inn kapte par bann carbon sinks natirel, lot lamwatie-la rest dan latmosfer. Konsantrasion CO2 dan latmosfer finn pas 280 a 415 ppm (parti par milyon) dan lespas 150 an. Bizin remont a trwa milyon lane desela pou retrouv sa kantite konsantrasion-la lor later.
V1C12L2: Lamwatie CO2 ki nou large sak lane, li absorbe par bann carbon sinks: - vezetasion pou 1/4 (atraver fotosintez) - losean pou 1/4 - leres (1/2) rest dan latmosfer.
V1C13L2: Lefe Greenhouse li natirel. Dayer, premie GHG natirel se lavaper delo. San GHG, planet ti pou 33°C  pli fre. Me CO2 ek lezot GHG ki koze par imin zot ogmant sa GHG natirel la e se sa ki resof klima.
V1C14L2: Sa grafik-la explik kotsa lenerzi ki akimile lor later ale, akoz forcing radiatif: li resof losean, fer laglas fonn, travers dan later e resof latmosfer.
V1C15L2: Forcing radiatif se mezir dezekilib ant lenerzi ki ariv sak segonn lor later ek lenerzi ki ale. Li vo 3,8 W/m² (Watt par m²) pou greenhouse ek - 1 W/m² pou bann aerozol, e li fer 2,8 W/m² an tou.
V1C16L2: Preske tou bann glasie finn diminie. Par santenn finn deza disparet. Me selman, bann glasie ena enn rol regilater lor manier gagn delo dou.
V1C17L2: Losean absorb 91% lenerzi ki akimile lor later. Kan li sofe, delo dilate.
V1C18L2: Bankiz ki pe fonn li pa responsab ki delo lamer ou larivier monte (enn glason ki fonn dan enn labwason pa fer ver-la deborde).
V1C19L1: Bann gro blok glasie pe fonn
V1C19L2: Bann gro blok glasie se Greenland ek Antarktik. Si zot fonn net, sa pou fer nivo lamer monte par 7m pou Greenland ek 54 m pou Antarktik. Pandan dernie lepok glasier, bann blok glasie ti telman gro ki nivo lamer ti 120m pli ba ki azordi.
V1C20L2: Evaporasion ki ena lor sirfas losean, li ogmante si delo ek ler sofe. Sa kree plis niaz ki vinn lapli. Me si evaporasion fer depi later, sa fer later-la sek.
V1C21L2: La nou pe koz enn mwayenn tanperatir ler o-ra later. Sa mwayenn-la inn deza ogmante par 1,2°C depi 1900. Dapre bann prozeksion, sa pou ogmante depi 1,5°C ziska 5°C ziska 2100. Me selman, dan dernie peryod glasier (ena 20,000 lane), li ti selman 5°C pli ba ki azordi... ek deglasiasion inn ale pandan 10,000 lane!
V1C21L6: Sanzman tanperatir lor sirfas lemond par rapor a 1850-1900
V1C22L2: Depi 1900, nivo losean finn monte par 20 santimet. Se akoz dilatasion delo, bann glasie ek bann gro blok glasie ki pe fonn.
V1C22L3: Varyasion enn mwayenn nivo bann losean dan lemond par rapor a 1900 (m)
V1C22L7: Senaryo extrem, me 'ki pa kapav exklir'
V1C23L2: Si pH bese, li pli difisil pou kalker forme, sirtou pou bann koki.
V1C24L2: Kan CO2 disoud dan losean, li transform an bann ion asid (H2CO3 apre HCO3-). Sa ena kouma lefe asidifie losean (pH bese)
V1C24L3: Asidifikasion losean an fonksion bann senaryo SSP (pH)
V1C25L2: Bann zanimo ek bann plant afekte par bann sanzman tanperatir ek sikl delo: zot deplase ou disparet (oubien, pli rarman, zot miltipliye)
V1C26L2: Pertirbasion sikl delo kapav amenn plis delo ou mwins delo. Si ena plis delo, sa kapav fer larivier deborde. Avek irbanizasion ou si later inn vinn dir ar lasesres, li pir parski lerla, delo sourse.
V1C27L2: Pteropods ek coccolithophores, zot a la baz lasenn alimanter dan lamer e zot disparision menas tou biodiversite marinn. Resofman delo zwe ousi enn rol inportan dan frazilizasion biodiversite marinn.
V1C28L2: Avek resofman, bann zanimo sanz plas. Selman, ena ladan ki port bann maladi e lerla sa bann maladi-la kapav ariv bann bann landrwa kot bann popilasion pa iminize kont sa bann maladi-la.
V1C29L2: Bann pteropods se bann zooplankton e bann coccolithophores se bann phytoplankton. Se bann mikro-organism ki ena enn koki an kalker.
V1C30L2: Pertirbasion sikl delo kapav amenn plis delo ou mwins delo. Si ena mwins delo, se lasesres. Nou estime ki bann lasesres kapav miltipliye dan lavenir.
V1C31L2: Bann resours delo dou afekte par bann sanzman dan kantite lapli ek disparision bann glasie ki zwe enn rol regilater lor kantite delo dan bann larivier.
V1C32L2: Prodiksion agrikol kapav afekte par tanperatir, lasesres, bann levennman extrem, inondasion, sibmersion (ex: delta Nil)
V1C33L2: Bann siklonn ek pertirbasion amenn divan (donk bann vag) ek bann bas presion. Me, sak hectopascal an mwins, se 1 santimet delo anplis. Sa kapav amenn bann sibmersion (inondasion lor lakot) qui vinn pli grav avek ogmantasion nivo losean.
V1C34L2: Bann siklonn alimant zot avek lenerzi delo so ki a la sirfas losean. Zot pwisans finn ogmante akoz sanzman klimatik.
V1C35L2: Bann insandi deklanse par lasesres ek bann vag saler. Zot emet CO2 parey kouma deforestasion
V1C36L2: Avek ogmantasion tanperatir, bann vag saler vinn pli frekan ek pli for.
V1C37L2: Bann lafaminn kapav vinn depi bes rannman agrikol ek kan biodiversite marinn bese.
V1C38L2: Lafaminn, deplasman bann porter maladi, vag saler ek konfli arme kapav afekte lasante imin
V1C39L2: Bann konsekans sanzman klimatik pou definitivman fer ki bann imin pou nepli kapav rest dan sertin ekosistem e sa pou fors zot migre.
V1C40L2: Se koumsa ki bizin evite ki sa arive...
V1C41L2: Permafrost se enn later ki konzele an permanans. Kapav konstate ki li pe koumans dekonzele, e larg dan ler methane ek CO2, alaswit dekonpozision matier organik ki ziska la ti konzele. Sa amenn enn serk retroaksion ek anplifikasion, parey kouma bann dife dan lafore ou modifikasion albedo kan bankiz fonn.
V1C42L2: Sirkilasion thermohaline ki Gulf Stream fer parti, kapav ralanti akoz kantite delo dou depi Greenland ki pe fonn. Sa pou deregle ankor plis sikl delo ek bes kapasite losean absorb CO2 ek saler.
V1C999L2: Fresk Klima finn kree par Cédric Ringenbach. So difizion asire par Association la Fresque du Climat
V1C999L3: Lisans itilizasion se Creative Commons BY-NC-ND pou enn itilizasion non-profesionel.
V1C999L4: Tou itilizasion komersial, ou reminere, ena bann drwa itilizasion 10% montan (san tax) faktir ou reminerasion. Tou itilizasion dan lantrepriz, san intervansion enn animater exteryer ki reminere, bizin pran bann drwa itilizasion ki koresponn a 3 € san tax par partisipan. Lisans konple disponib isi: https://fresqueduclimat.org/licence/ Bann drwa itilizasion bizin vers lor www.fresqueduclimat.org/droits/
V1C999L6: L’association La Fresque du Climat : contact@fresqueduclimat.org
